about_the_game:
Blood Radiant is a lovecraftian soulslike set in a world where interdimensional flesh demons harvest your pain in the form of loosh to power their dark mechanations. You are a foolish chad who believes they can conquer these dark forces and make them do your bidding. And so you seek out the island that exists at the intersection of universes, for you will have the power of gods or you will be doomed to damnation!

  • Challenging soulslike combat against distinct enemies with many weapons such as great swords, samurai swords, axes, hammers, daggers, a chainsaw, magic weapons, throwing knives, dynamite, flame weapons, metal armor, and more.

  • Meet strange NPCs and learn about the world around you. Help them and they can become vendors in your sanctuary or unlock secret areas.

  • Dodge, dash, roll, block, break poise, normal attack, heavy attack, and backstab your way to victory.

  • Finish cryptic quests and uncover secrets to unlock multiple endings.

  • Looping, interconnected levels and optional bosses.

  • Enemies including wolves, cultists, assassins, sea zombies, skull knights, forest guardians, biblically accurate angels, mutant flesh spiders, and more.

  • Fight through beaches, cliffs, towns, castles, research institutes, the future, and alien dimensions. Find hidden equipment and secret areas.

  • Unlock New Game Plus for added difficulty.

  • Defeating enemies gives you radiance. Radiance is used to level up your stats or purchase items from vendors.

  • Death results in the loss of radiance, with one chance for recovery. Die too many times and the run ends in disgrace.

  • Some things come down to luck: item locations are different on every playthrough.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 or AMD Ryzen 7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1070 or AMD Radeon RX Vega 56
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Blood Radiant is a lovecraftian soulslike action-RPG set in a world where interdimensional flesh demons harvest your pain in the form of loosh to power their dark mechanations. Discover eldritch horrors, weapons, power-ups, and fellow travelers as you unravel the island’s secrets.
